channel.description: Recent content in geek on Jorge Cortell blog

item.title: Processing thousands of files using Terminal commands
item.description: How to fix a problem that spawns over more than two thousand files without spending days with a word processor? CLI to the rescue.

item.title: Hours of computer code analysis to fix one typo
item.description: I noticed time ago that when sharing my blog posts in social media, the post image was not featured. Finally I decided to look into it… little did I know what a rabbit hole I was getting into!

item.title: New Blog
item.description: As it will be evident, I have changed my blog.
